title: Wizard Works Umbra Light Mount
content:
Wizard Works has a solution for a common problem for bar bag users, which is that the bag can interfere with the beam of your front light, whether it’s bar or fork crown mounted. Enter the Wizard Works Umbra Light Mount (£42), a nifty arm designed to drop your front light away from your bag and give it room to shine again. The Umbra can be run on the drive side or non-drive side, and while it’s designed for dynamo users, the Umbra is compatible with bar-mounted battery lights by using an adaptor like the Paul Gino.

Made in Yorkshire by Bentley Components and in stock now at Wizard Works.
